(Hello, Jason. 

Although my character Hot Rod, is the original, he has been rebuilt as a
Maximal. If you read the rules carefuly, you'll see that Autobot and
Decepticons are OK, but they must be rebuilt as Maximals or Predicons,
because there are no giant-bots granted. Anyway Yanshosh, the oner of
the RPG, gave me permission to use Hot Rod.)
